description:
This course is designed to help people upgrade from Office 2003 to Office 2010. We introduce the new features such as the: Office Ribbon, the new file formats, the File Tab and Backstage View plus much more.

Applications covered in this course include:
Microsoft Excel
Microsoft Word
Microsoft Outlook
Microsoft PowerPoint

The online training course runs for just over 3.5 hours and caters for all skill levels.
title: Upgrading from Office 2003 to Office 2010 - Essentials
